abstract: Paris looks majestic in snow. I want more snowy Paris goodness.

Snow in Paris just sounds so magical! Over here in the Netherlands it's already melting or turning into ice :( 
How are you doing by the way?
In Boston, Ma here and we have ice, ice, and more ice 😒. Love the music btw! Also, thanks for letting us see the behind the scenes of your voice over work! Pretty cool job!
